data.eml:eml: The larvae of two species of Bokermannohyla (Anura, Hylidae, Cophomantini) endemic to the highlands of central Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lins, Anna Carolina Ramalho, Magalhães, Rafael Félix De, Costa, Renan Nunes, Brandão, Reuber Albuquerque, Py-Daniel, Tainã Rapp, Miranda, Núbia Esther De Oliveira, Maciel, Natan Medeiros, Nomura, Fausto, Pezzuti, Tiago Leite (2018): The larvae of two species of Bokermannohyla (Anura, Hylidae, Cophomantini) endemic to the highlands of central Brazil. Zootaxa 4527 (4): 501-520, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4527.4.3
